Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/94th
ShortDescription: NB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Indiana, 91st, and State due to, street blockage near State/94th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Indiana, 91st, and State due to, street blockage near State/94th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
